decisions.name: RCC_Already_Passed_For_Current_Enquiry_Client
decisions.label: RCC Already Passed For Current Enquiry Client

formulas.name: DateBefore1Year
formulas.expression: IF( OR( MOD( YEAR( {!$Flow.CurrentDate} ), 400 ) = 0, AND( MOD( YEAR( {!$Flow.CurrentDate} ), 4 ) = 0, MOD( YEAR( {!$Flow.CurrentDate} ), 100 ) != 0 ) ), {!$Flow.CurrentDate}-366, {!$Flow.CurrentDate}-365)

formulas.name: DateBefore3Year
formulas.expression: IF( OR( MOD( YEAR( {!$Flow.CurrentDate} ), 400 ) = 0, AND( MOD( YEAR( {!$Flow.CurrentDate} ), 4 ) = 0, MOD( YEAR( {!$Flow.CurrentDate} ), 100 ) != 0 ) ), {!$Flow.CurrentDate}-(366+(365*2)), {!$Flow.CurrentDate}-(365*3))

fields.fieldText: Does the Entity have International Operations
fields.helpText: International operations mean all of a companys operating locations of business that exist in other countries, including locations of all related entities. Operating locations include administrative, sales, retail, ser-vice, manufacturing, assembly, distribution or warehouse facilities

fields.name: Please_provide_a_description_of_the_proposed_business_relationship
fields.fieldText: Please provide a description of the proposed business relationship

fields.name: Is_the_business_relationship_an_arm_s_length_transaction_and_in_the_normal_cours
fields.fieldText: Is the business relationship an arm's length transaction and in the normal course of business for your firm and the vendor?

fields.name: Engagement_Narrative
fields.helpText: Please provide specific details in the form of a short summary on the nature of the engagement relationship, including the scope of services to be provided.

fields.name: Is_the_entity_owned_in_whole_or_in_part_by_one_or_more_private_Equity_venture_ca
fields.fieldText: Is the entity owned in whole or in part by one or more private Equity / venture capital (PE/VC) Group(s)?
fields.helpText:
Ownership in whole means a complete control and an ownership in part means a significant influence i.e. above 20% and less than 100%. When <20% ownership interest exists, engagement teams should evaluate the following qualitative factor to determine if significant influence exists :

representation of the board of directors

significant intercompany transactions or technology dependency 

interchange of managerial personnel 

participation of the policy making process

extent of ownership by an investor in relation to the concentration of the other shareholder.

fields.name: Please_identify_the_PE_VC_group_s_here_and_include_them_as_a_related_entity_on_t
fields.fieldText: Please identify the PE/VC group(s) here and include them as a related entity on the family tree tab

rightValue.stringValue: Yes, the entity is owned by a PE/VC group

fields.name: Please_identify_the_PE_VC_and_include_them_as_a_related_entity_on_t1
fields.fieldText: Please identify the PE/VC group(s) here and include them as a related entity on the family tree tab

rightValue.stringValue: Yes, the entity is owned by a PE/VC group

fields.name: In_case_of_IRC_What_type_of_response_is_required
fields.fieldText: In case of IRC. What type of response is required?
fields.helpText:
Except when audit services are proposed to a publicly listed client, responses should be required only if there are relationships to report. However, whether or not option may be selected for any type of service, with explanation for it in the space provided below.

Please explain the reason for selecting 'whether or not' option, in case of other than audit services proposed to publicly listed clients.

fields.name: In_case_of_an_IRC_how_far_back_in_time_do_you_want_relationship_to_be_reported
fields.fieldText: In case of an IRC, how far back in time do you want relationship to be reported
fields.helpText: The default length of time for all IRCs is one year back, from the date the IRC is created. If needed, the engagement team may select a more extensive lookback date.

fields.name: What_type_of_Vendor_relationship_do_you_want_to_reported
fields.fieldText: What type of Vendor relationship, do you want to report
fields.helpText: When audit service is proposed, teams should request the reporting of all vendor relationships, regardless of the level of significance. When a non-audit service is proposed, teams should request the reporting of vendor relationships only if they are significant either to the vendor or to the firm.

fields.name: Please_identify_include_them_as_a_related_entity_on_t2
fields.fieldText: Please identify the PE/VC group(s) here and include them as a related entity on the family tree tab

rightValue.stringValue: Yes, the entity is owned by a PE/VC group

fields.name: Please_identify_the_PE_VC_group_s_here_and_include_related_entity_on_t3
fields.fieldText: Please identify the PE/VC group(s) here and include them as a related entity on the family tree tab

rightValue.stringValue: Yes, the entity is owned by a PE/VC group

fields.name: In_case_public_audit_service_is_not_proposed_please_explain_the_reason_for_selec
fields.fieldText: In case, public audit service is not proposed, please explain the reason for selected - whether or not

rightValue.stringValue: Responses required, whether or not relationships are identified

fields.name: In_case_of_domestic_relationship_check_how_far_back_in_time_do_you_want_relation
fields.fieldText: In case of domestic relationship check, how far back in time do you want relationship to be reported
fields.helpText: The default length of time for all DRCs is three years back, from the date the IRC is created. If needed, the engagement team may select a more extensive lookback date.

fields.name: What_is_the_entity_s_local_industry_if_different_than_global_industry_sectors
fields.fieldText: What is the entity's local industry (if different than global industry sectors)?

fields.name: In_case_of_an_IRC_do_you_want_the_responding_firm_s_to_circulate_this_check_to_a
fields.fieldText: In case of an IRC, do you want the responding firm(s) to circulate this check to all their partners?
fields.helpText: Select yes only if the check needs to be circulated to all the responding member firm partners (s) to gain details outside of what is available in the firm databases. Only when an audit, forensic and litigation services are proposed, it is advised to select Yes.

validationRule.errorMessage: Required only if Category Of Proposed Services is Selected 'Other'.

textTemplates.name: AuditTaxonomyTemplate
textTemplates.text:
AUDIT TAXONOMY


An audit engagement is an assurance engagement to provide a high level of assurance that financial statements are free of material misstatement, such as an engagement in accordance with International Standards on Auditing. This includes a statutory audit which is an audit required by national legislation or other regulation.
